spec_data.Name: perl-Perl-Stripper
spec_data.Description:
This module is yet another PPI-based Perl source code stripper. Its focus
is on customization and stripping significant information from source code.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 03 Aug 2017 11:18:09 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Yet another PPI-based Perl source code stripper
